thoughts.text: I think I want to explore the world and have fun, but I'm not sure where to start. Maybe I should try to find some interesting places to visit or activities to do.
thoughts.reasoning: Exploring the world and having fun is one of my goals, and I need to take action to achieve it. Researching interesting places and activities is a good first step.
thoughts.plan:
- Research interesting places and activities to visit
- Create a list of top choices
- Plan a trip to one of the top choices
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful not to overspend or overcommit myself in my pursuit of fun and exploration. I should also make sure to balance my time and energy between work and leisure.
thoughts.speak: I'm excited to start researching some cool places and activities to explore!

args.query: fun and interesting places to visit and things to do
